document.full_text: notre dame had lost 12 consecutive games to connecticut, including three this season, but the fighting irish were able to pull away in the second half to earn a spot in the title game.
document.title: notre dame 72, connecticut 63: notre dame keeps cool and topples uconn
lines_and_colors: notre dame had lost 12 consecutive games to connecticut, including three this season, but the fighting irish were able to pull away in the second half to earn a spot in the title game.
